thread.section_title: Atlantic Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very pleasing in all respects
thread.title_full: Very pleasing in all respects - Review of Atlantic Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: SRossC
title: Very pleasing in all respects
text:
Very friendly and extremely helpful staff. Convenient location from travelling and shopping. Simple, clean and well ordered room. First rate shower and excellent, unfussy hotel reception and breakfast rooms. Very comfortable bed. Some rooms have a bath. I have no hesitation to stay again, recommending to friends and look forward to my next visit.
Breakfast/petit dejeuner is served courteously, efficiently and is varied and substantial.
Wifi provided within the room for email, WhatsApp etc
Room Tip: Courtyard rooms are quieter and have a bath. See more room tips
